subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ lead over Pittsburgh in the Eastern Conference remained intact despite the loss, but emerging playmaker Mats Zuccarello was sidelined indefinitely after fracturing his wrist.
snippet: The Rangers’ lead over Pittsburgh in the Eastern Conference remained intact despite the loss, but emerging playmaker Mats Zuccarello was sidelined indefinitely after fracturing his wrist.
